## Función de Densidad

$$
f(x)= \left\{
	       \begin{array}{ll}
		 \lambda\displaystyle e^{-\lambda x}      & \mathrm{si\ } x \geq 0 \\
		 0     & \mathrm{si\ } x < 0  
	       \end{array}
	     \right.
$$


## Función de Distribución

$$
 F(x) = \left\{
	       \begin{array}{ll}
		 1-\displaystyle e^{-\lambda x}      & \mathrm{si\ } x \geq 0 \\
		 0     & \mathrm{si\ } x < 0  
	       \end{array}
	     \right.
$$

## Media

$$
E[X]= \displaystyle \frac{1}{\lambda}
$$

## Varianza

$$
Var[X]= \displaystyle \frac{1}{\lambda^2}
$$
